section.p: You are travelling across the plains. To the south lie the mountains of the Spine of Harkun, with white-peaked Sky Mountain towering above the rest.
Night falls, and you make camp.

The plains are flat and desolate, and you need to hunt for food. . If you succeed, you find a grouse to eat.
If you fail, you go hungry and must lose 1 Stamina point.
If you still live, the new day dawns. Sky Mountain casts its morning shadow over you.
